Rich S

a wee bit too rich for my blood but a beautiful tsuba .

-M

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Expensive Tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Ok so why did this go to $2.5k ??  Opinions anyone? Matt My guess is because it is beautiful, terrific, and rare!  Wow is this a wonderful guard! Look at the
messages.messageBody:
Ok so why did this go to $2.5k ?? Opinions anyone?
Matt

My guess is because it is beautiful, terrific, and rare! Wow is this a
wonderful guard! Look at the thickness! Look at the condition! It drips
shibui! I should have bid. What could I love more for a crappy 2500 bucks?
The only question is why Mark called it Heianjo instead of Onin.
Ahh, crap I shoulda bid!

Peter Bleed
Associate Dean
